verses.text: \w After|strong="H1961"\w* these \w events|strong="H1697"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Abram \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vision|strong="H4236"\w*: “\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, Abram. \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H3966"\w* \w reward|strong="H7939"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H1931"\w* Abram replied, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, since \w I|strong="H5414"\w* remain \w childless|strong="H6185"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w heir|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* Eliezer \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*?”

Abram continued, “\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w offspring|strong="H2233"\w*, \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* servant \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w heir|strong="H3423"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* Abram, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w heir|strong="H3423"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w comes|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H4578"\w* \w body|strong="H4578"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w heir|strong="H3423"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w Now|strong="H4994"\w* \w look|strong="H5027"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w count|strong="H5608"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w stars|strong="H3556"\w*, \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H4994"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w*.” \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w He|strong="H3201"\w* \w told|strong="H5608"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w So|strong="H3541"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w offspring|strong="H2233"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w*.”

Abram believed \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w credited|strong="H2803"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H2803"\w* \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* told \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Ur \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* land \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* Abram replied, “\w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w how|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4100"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*?”

\w And|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w*, “\w Bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w Me|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w heifer|strong="H5697"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w*, \w and|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ram, \w each|strong="H3947"\w* \w three|strong="H8027"\w* years \w old|strong="H8027"\w*, along \w with|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w turtledove|strong="H8449"\w* \w and|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H1469"\w* \w pigeon|strong="H1469"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* Abram \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w Him|strong="H5414"\w*, split \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w down|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w middle|strong="H8432"\w*, \w and|strong="H3947"\w* \w laid|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* halves \w opposite|strong="H7125"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H7453"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w birds|strong="H6833"\w*, however, \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w cut|strong="H1334"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w half|strong="H1335"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w birds|strong="H5861"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w prey|strong="H5861"\w* \w descended|strong="H3381"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w carcasses|strong="H6297"\w*, \w but|strong="H5921"\w* Abram \w drove|strong="H5380"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w away|strong="H5380"\w*.

\w As|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* setting, Abram \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w deep|strong="H8639"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8639"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H2009"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* terror \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2825"\w* \w overwhelmed|strong="H5307"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Abram, “\w Know|strong="H3045"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w certain|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w descendants|strong="H2233"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* land \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H5647"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w enslaved|strong="H5647"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* mistreated four \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1571"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w slaves|strong="H5647"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* afterward \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w depart|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w many|strong="H1419"\w* \w possessions|strong="H7399"\w*.

\w You|strong="H2896"\w*, however, \w will|strong="H2896"\w* \w go|strong="H7872"\w* \w to|strong="H2896"\w* \w your|strong="H6912"\w* fathers \w in|strong="H6912"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w and|strong="H2896"\w* \w be|strong="H7965"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w at|strong="H6912"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w ripe|strong="H2896"\w* \w old|strong="H7872"\w* \w age|strong="H7872"\w*.

\w In|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* descendants \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w here|strong="H2008"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H5771"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Amorites \w is|strong="H5771"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w complete|strong="H8003"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* set \w and|strong="H5674"\w* darkness \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w fallen|strong="H1961"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w smoking|strong="H6227"\w* \w firepot|strong="H8574"\w* \w and|strong="H5674"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* flaming \w torch|strong="H3940"\w* \w appeared|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H5674"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w between|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* halves \w of|strong="H8121"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* carcasses.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* Abram, saying, “\w To|strong="H5704"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w descendants|strong="H2233"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* land—\w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w River|strong="H5104"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="H6578"\w*—
the land of the \w Kenites|strong="H7017"\w*, \w Kenizzites|strong="H7074"\w*, \w Kadmonites|strong="H6935"\w*,
\w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, \w Rephaites|strong="H7497"\w*,
Amorites, \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, \w Girgashites|strong="H1622"\w*, \w and|strong="H2983"\w* \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*.”
